root.name: Obulis
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by IonFX Studios and published by Meridian4, Obulis is based on the award-winning mobile game of the same name. Obulis is a puzzle game that relies solely on physics effects, speed momentum and the force of gravity.GameplayThe goal of Obulis is to drop all of the colored spheres into their respective pots. Spheres are bound to the scenario through the use of chains and ropes and the like and the player has to release them from these constraints in order to set the spheres and the whole level in motion. Obulis is easy to learn, but very hard to master, especially when coming into the later levels.Among other things, the game features:Over 150 LevelsOver a Dozen Interesting ThemesBreathtaking Graphics and MusicSpectacular Physics and Special Effects17 AchievementsSystem RequirementsOperating System: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1.0 GHz ProcessorMemory: 128 MB RAMGraphics Card: DirectX compatible 64 MB graphics cardDirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive Space: 50 MB of available hard disk spaceSound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
